spacing_start.description: Borehole-to-borehole spacing distance at beginning of search.

spacing_stop.description: Borehole-to-borehole spacing distance at end of search.

spacing_step.description: Step size for borehole-to-borehole spacing search.

rotate_start.description: Field rotation angle at beginning of search.

rotate_stop.description: Field rotation angle at end of search.

rotate_step.description: Step size for field rotation search.

max_height.description: Maximum height, or active length, of each borehole heat exchanger.

min_height.description: Minimum height, or active length, of each borehole heat exchanger.

property_boundary.description: (x, y) coodinate points of closed polygon defining property boundary. Points should be entered in a counter-clockwise fasion.

no_go_boundaries.description: (x, y) coodinate points of closed polygon defining go/no-go boundaries. Go/no-go zones must lie within the area defined in 'property_boundary'. Points should be entered in a counter-clockwise fasion.
